name: Jane Doe
title: Senior Full Stack Developer
summary: Experienced Full Stack Developer with over 10 years of expertise in building scalable web applications. Proficient in JavaScript, Python, and cloud infrastructure. Passionate about creating clean, efficient, and user-friendly solutions.

experience.title: Lead Frontend Architect
accomplishments: Led the migration of a monolithic frontend to a modern React-based micro-frontend architecture, improving performance by 40%.
Mentored a team of 8 frontend developers, establishing best practices for code reviews, testing, and CI/CD pipelines.
Architected and implemented a new design system, resulting in a 30% reduction in development time for new features.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
accomplishments: Developed and maintained a high-traffic e-commerce platform using Node.js and Python (Django).
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs to support mobile and web clients.
Improved database query performance by 25% through optimization and indexing strategies.
